name: Super Mega Boy
description:
Super Mega Boy can best be described as...

A remake of the classical Platformer Game Super Mario bros. 

Jump and shoot your way through 100 graphically challenging levels. Just as you already know it from the classic Super Mario Bros. Conquer bosses who stand in your way on your journey.


You can play with the keyboard. The direction keys indicate the direction and Z lets you run faster. If you have collected a fireflower, you can also fire fireballs with Z to destroy your opponents. You can jump with the space bar.

You have also the possibility to connect a Gamecontroller and play with them. 

  • Must have for every Jump and Run Mario-Fan. 
  • Simple but addictive gameplay. 
  • Polished HD graphics.
  • Many cute places to discover. 
  • More than 8 Endbosses awaiting you. 
  • A lot of traps to avoid. 
  • Unique Gameplay feeling.
  • Find lots of hidden Blocks and discover secret worlds.
  • Full Xbox 360 / PS4 controller support.
